extractFactDictList.question: What is the name of the water source in intermittent ravines?
extractFactDictList.sentence: Intermittent ravines: These are ravines that have a seasonal source of water, such as a spring or stream that flows only during certain times of the year.

extractFactDictList.question: What time of the year are intermittent ravines?
extractFactDictList.sentence: Intermittent ravines: These are ravines that have a seasonal source of water, such as a spring or stream that flows only during certain times of the year.
